title: Overflowing Garbage Bins
description: Public garbage bins are overflowing and causing a foul smell in the area.

title: Plastic Waste in Lake
description: Large amount of plastic bottles and food packets floating on the lake surface.

title: Illegal Dumping Behind Market
description: Vendors dumping waste materials behind the market without proper disposal.

title: Blocked Drainage System
description: Drainage system blocked due to accumulated plastic waste, causing flooding during rain.

title: Uncollected Household Waste
description: Waste collection service has been inactive for a week, leading to pileups of garbage bags.

title: Littered Park Area
description: Visitors leaving behind food wrappers and bottles after picnics.

title: Industrial Waste Leakage
description: Nearby factory releasing untreated chemical waste directly into the river.

title: Illegal Landfill Expansion
description: Unauthorized landfill site expanding into residential area.

title: Broken Footpath with Waste
description: Footpath damaged and covered with litter, making it unsafe for pedestrians.

title: E-waste Dump Site
description: Discarded computers, phones, and batteries dumped in open field.

title: Plastic Bottles Near School
description: Students littering plastic bottles and wrappers near school playground.

title: Unattended Dead Tree Blocking Road
description: Fallen tree from storm blocking the main road and collecting debris underneath.

title: Sewage Overflow in Street
description: Broken sewage pipeline flooding the street with dirty water.

title: Dumped Construction Debris
description: Construction company dumping bricks and cement waste on public land.

title: Oil Spill in Drain
description: Local workshop releasing engine oil and grease into nearby drain.

title: Mosquito Breeding Site
description: Stagnant water in open containers causing mosquito breeding.

title: Unclean Bus Terminal
description: Littered area with uncollected food waste and paper wrappers.

title: Garbage Burning by Locals
description: Residents burning garbage in open field, causing toxic smoke.

title: Abandoned Vehicles with Waste
description: Old abandoned vehicles gathering garbage and insects underneath.

title: Community Pond Pollution
description: Household waste and soap residue being released into local pond.
